CustomField.description: Use this field to determine the approximate deposit revenue rate for new deposit balances in the deal an FI originates outside of nCino. This value reflects a FTP or cost of funds that is confirmed with the FI. By default, it is 2.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The approximate reserve rate for deposit balances to be held on the balance sheet. This value reflects a FTP or cost of funds that is confirmed with the FI.
CustomField.label: New Deposit Revenue Rate
